original_title: Corneille-Brecht ou Rome l'unique objet de mon ressentiment
overview: Co-director Cornelia Geiser sits by a window on an easy chair reading aloud a few verses by Corneille, then a somewhat longer excerpt from Brecht - each writer referencing Rome but really condemning injustice in his own era.
title: Corneille-Brecht ou Rome l'unique objet de mon ressentiment
